channel.title: So What Did You Get?
channel.description:
So what did [b]you[/b] get for Christmas?
I thought i would be a Christmas [i]Tree[/i] this year and make a few threads to get into the spirit.

item.title: So What Did You Get?
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:109, topic:252583”][quote author=Zoss link=topic=333594.msg2602017#msg2602017 date=1230304705]

Bleh.
[/quote]
LOL. I can just imagine Granny giving you that; “Get some nice shoes, go on, spoil yourself!”[/quote]
Yeah, happens every single time.
Don’t talk to me.

Read full topic

item.title: So What Did You Get?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

This Christmas I got what I expected;

My Aunt and my Uncle and my Dad came down and we had Christmas Dinner outside by a fire (it wasn’t too cold, the fire made it perfect), we talked and had a good time and just shot the shit, then they wanted to see the new place I’m moving to, so I showed them, we came back, I wished them a Merry Christmas, but I said it in the same way I have for the last 3 years;
“Merry Christmas to all, and to all get the hell out.”,

Never the less, have a good laugh, I come in and pass out, I wake up at 2:30 A.M. and I join the ranks of MITB once more.

0 Gifts. Also, those of you with sisters/brothers, be glad of it, I’m an only child.

Read full topic

item.title: So What Did You Get?
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

A nice ring, really touching card from my mother, some kitchen towels, different kind of kitchen and household things and some glasses. Actually something that I will need, I’m really happy with those presents. They didn’t cost much (most of them are used) but that’s not the idea.

Read full topic

item.title: So What Did You Get?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Now that Christmas has actually happened, I’ll share what else I got. I got a Leatherman Core, a Pocket Watch, $50.00 gift card to Best buy, two shirts, and a new butterfly knife cause my old one got all rusty.

Read full topic

item.title: So What Did You Get?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:95, topic:252583”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=333594.msg2601364#msg2601364 date=1230249266]

So, I got a new motherboard/cpu/ram/graphics card, an mp3 player, a new phone cuz my old one was fucked, and a ton of chocolate+dvds. And a shaver because cunts keep robbing mine and making me even more trampy looking.

I did good at scamming the relatives this year.

In before 20+ posts saying “I don’t celebrate christmas” from rich white boys who then go get thousands of dollars worth of games console from their parents.

[/quote]

But I DO celebrate christmas

Our familys gift giving dosen’t usually go to quite this extent though I was surprised, my parents seem to be having some kind of flying-the-nest syndrome where they became convinced this year would be our last family chritmas all together and so they had to lavish us with gifts and do awesome things all day. Twas nice.[/quote]
Envious. My Mum cleaned while I ate bread rolls.

sppt:

The gift of Christmas is being able to see friends/family and just have a good time with them. That’s all I got and all I’ll ever expect.

I’d rather have all my family come together and have a BBQ than receive presents. I tell Mum not to buy me presents, as I don’t really need anything and don’t want to waste valuable money on just one day.

Could use that money to throw a party for everyone and have an even better day.

Read full topic
